import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Contacts from './Contacts' import '../App.css' import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' const Login = () => { const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState(false) const handleLogin = () => { setIsLoggedIn(true) if (isLoggedIn) { return } } return (
Username Password
) } export default Login
